entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain or snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 14 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Temperature rising to 14 in the evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:10 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
